description: Create a new protect configuration. By default all country rule sets for each capability are set to ALLOW. Update the country rule sets using UpdateProtectConfigurationCountryRuleSet. A protect configurations name is stored as a Tag with the key set to Name and value as the name of the protect configuration.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If you don't specify a client token, a randomly generated token is used for the request to ensure idempotency. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: An array of key and value pair tags that are associated with the resource. (dict) --- The list of tags to be added to the specified topic. The key identifier, or name, of the tag. The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_items.name: ProtectConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the protect configuration.

nested_items.name: ProtectConfigurationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the protect configuration.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the protect configuration was created, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: AccountDefault
nested_items.description: This is true if the protect configuration is set as your account default protect configuration.

nested_items.name: DeletionProtectionEnabled
nested_items.description: When set to true deletion protection is enabled. By default this is set to false.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: An array of key and value pair tags that are associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.
